General.Name: Saudi Ceramic Co.
General.Description: Saudi Ceramic Company manufactures and sells ceramic products, water heaters, and other products in Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates through, Ceramic Tiles and Sanitary Ware; Water Heaters; and Ceramic Pipes segments. It offers ceramic, porcelain, outdoor, and swimming pool tiles; sanitary ware products comprising wash basins, water closets, wall hangings, and above counters; water heaters; bathroom furniture and accessories, including bathtubs, shower trays, taps, and seat covers; red bricks; clay pipe; bathroom fixtures and finishes; and industrial minerals, such as limestone, silica sands, kaolin, feldspar, clay, dolomite, and calcite. Saudi Ceramic Company was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Fahad Road, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11481
